quality_assessment: Documentation is accurate and comprehensive. JSON examples correctly use the unified format (spec 108) with proper field structure. Terminal examples accurately reflect actual output. All internal links are valid.

issues.description: Redundant path in Advanced Features link
issues.fix_suggestion: Simplify to relative path within same directory
issues.note: Link is functional, just unnecessarily complex

issues.description: Line number references in source documentation may drift as code evolves
issues.fix_suggestion: Consider using function/struct names rather than line numbers for stable references

positive_aspects: JSON examples correctly use unified format with 'type': 'Function' tagging (spec 108)
All JSON fields match actual implementation: score, category, priority, location, metrics, debt_type, function_role, dependencies, recommendation, impact, scoring_details
Priority values correctly shown as lowercase: critical, high, medium, low
debt_type correctly shown as tagged enum with variant-specific data (e.g., ComplexityHotspot with cyclomatic and cognitive)
Function role classification accurately documented with all roles: PureLogic, Orchestrator, IOWrapper, EntryPoint, PatternMatch, Debug, Unknown
Entropy-dampened validation example correctly shows adjusted_complexity and dampening_factor fields
Pattern detection example correctly shows pattern_type, pattern_confidence, and pattern_details fields
File-level debt example correctly shows god_object_indicators structure
Summary statistics example correctly shows format_version, metadata, summary, and items structure
Test file detection example correctly shows file_context_label field
Terminal output examples accurately reflect actual formatting with box-drawing characters
Before/after comparison example demonstrates real improvement workflow
Well-tested complex function example effectively demonstrates good practices
All internal links (output-formats.md, configuration.md, advanced-features.md) resolve correctly
improvement_suggestions: Simplify the Advanced Features link from '../analysis-guide/advanced-features.md' to './advanced-features.md'
Consider adding example showing cohesion metrics if file has them (spec 198)
Could add example showing context suggestion output for AI agents (spec 263)

function_role_enum.documented: PureLogic, Orchestrator, IOWrapper, EntryPoint, PatternMatch, Debug, Unknown

metadata.validation_focus: Verify examples are realistic and helpful
